Question.Question: Identify the compute service options in terms of flexibility, from most flexible to least flexible.
Options: Compute Engine
Google Kubernetes Engine
App Engine
Cloud Functions
Cloud Run

Options: IaaS

Question.Question: What is the Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: A Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers
A serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services
A fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale on Google Cloud Platform
A fully managed compute platform for deploying and scaling containerized applications quickly and securely
Answers: A Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers

Question.Question: What is the App Engine service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: A fully managed compute platform for deploying and scaling containerized applications quickly and securely
A serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services
A fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale on Google Cloud Platform
A Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers
Answers: A fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale on Google Cloud Platform

Question.Question: What is the Cloud Functions service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: A fully managed compute platform for deploying and scaling containerized applications quickly and securely
A serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services
A fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale on Google Cloud Platform
A Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers
Answers: A serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services

Question.Question: What is the Cloud Run service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: A fully managed compute platform for deploying and scaling containerized applications quickly and securely
A serverless execution environment for building and connecting cloud services
A fully managed, serverless platform for developing and hosting web applications at scale on Google Cloud Platform
A Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers
Answers: A fully managed compute platform for deploying and scaling containerized applications quickly and securely

Question.Question: Compute Engine lets you create Virtual Machines (VMs) called instances. [T/F]
Which of the following are characteristics of the Google Compute Engine service?
Options: Deployable in any region / zone of your choice
Automated scaling and load balancing capabilities
Public or private images usable to create instances
Pre-configured images and software packages are available in Google Cloud Marketplace
Answers: Deployable in any region / zone of your choice
Both public or private images usable to create instances
Pre-configured images and software packages are available in Google Cloud Marketplace

Question.Question: With the Google Compute Engine service, you can't decide what operating system and software to put on the Engine. It's locked to a Unix environment and a standard set of Google-supported software. [T/F]?
How are multiple instances managed in Google Compute Engine service?
What is the recommended solution for adding and removing capacity for instances automatically in Google Compute Engine service?
Google Compute Engine service does not allow you to attach/detach disks as needed. [T/F]?
Google Cloud Storage can be used as a storage option for the Google Compute Engine service. [T/F]?
What tool does Google allow you to use to securely connect to your Google Compute Engine service?
Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) is built on the same open-source Kubernetes project that was introduced by Google to the public in 2014. [T/F]?
Options: Container-orchestration system for automating deploying, scaling, and managing containers

Question.Question: To accommodate all customers who may already have existing Kubernetes clusters in their on-premesis data centers, Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) offers flexibility to integrate with any on-premesis Kubernetes deployments. [T/F]?
Under the hood (to funtion), Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) uses Compute Engine instances as nodes in a cluster. [T/F]?
What is a cluster in context to Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)?
Options: A group of nodes or Compute Engine instances
A collection of storage volumes used for persistent data
A virtual network segment for isolating container traffic
A set of predefined templates for deploying applications
Answers: A group of nodes or Compute Engine instances

Question.Question: What are characteristics of the Google App Engine service?
Options: Provisions servers and scales your appp instances based on demand
Connects with other Google services seamlessly
Integrates with Google's Web Security Scanner to identify threats
Use pre-configured or custom run-times to write the app in any language, like Go, Java, .NET, etc.
Answers: Provisions servers and scales your appp instances based on demand
Connects with other Google services seamlessly
Integrates with Google's Web Security Scanner to identify threats
Use pre-configured or custom run-times to write the app in any language, like Go, Java, .NET, etc.

Question.Question: Which of the following are true about the functions in the Cloud Functions service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: Simple, single-purpose functions that are attached to events
Triggered when an event being watched is fired
Manual functions require explicit invocation for execution
The functions can only interact with other Google Cloud services
Answers: Simple, single-purpose functions that are attached to events
Triggered when an event being watched is fired

Question.Question: Which of the following are true about the process once a function fires in the Cloud Functions service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: Your code executes in a fully managed environment
There is no need to provision any infrastructure or servers
You can define the exact server configuration for optimal performance
Functions are executed in a local development environment
Answers: Your code executes in a fully managed environment
There is no need to provision any infrastructure or servers

Question.Question: The Cloud Functions service on Google Cloud Platform allows you to write functions using which runtimes?
Options: Java
JavaScript
Python 3
Go

Question.Question: What are the uses cases for the Cloud Functions service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: Data processing or ETL operations (video transcoding)
Webhooks to respond to HTTP triggers
APIs that compose loosely coupled logic
Mobile backend functions
Answers: Data processing or ETL operations (video transcoding)
Webhooks to respond to HTTP triggers
APIs that compose loosely coupled logic

Question.Question: What open standard was Cloud Run built upon, enabling portability of any applications that were built on it?
What are characteristics of the Cloud Run service on Google Cloud Platform?
Options: Abstracts away all infrastructure management
Known as serverless for containers
Can write in any language, library, and/or binary
Automatically scales up and down depending on the traffic / incoming requests
Answers: Can write in any language, library, and/or binary
Automatically scales up and down depending on the traffic / incoming requests
